name: Titan’s Heart Engine
description: A massive biomechanical heart harvested from a colossal automaton, pulsating with faint, rhythmic vibrations.
uses: Powering entire cities if properly integrated

name: Ancient Leviathan Skull
description: A gargantuan skull of a mythical sea-beast, its empty eye sockets said to reflect lost civilizations.

name: Celestial Orrery Core
description: A vast, gear-laden sphere that once modeled entire star systems within its delicate clockwork.
uses: Charting cosmic ley lines for advanced mages
Predicting celestial events centuries in advance

name: Eldritch Tree of Whispers
description: A towering, ancient tree grown from twisted roots and faintly glowing bark, rumored to store aeons of forgotten knowledge.
uses: Housing spirits seeking to communicate wisdom

name: Astral Navigation Mast
description: A colossal mast carved from starsteel, capable of stabilizing floating islands or airships in cosmic currents.

name: Primordial Earthshell
description: A titanic carapace fragment from an extinct terrestrial titan, heavily etched with runes of mountain-making power.
uses: Foundation for forging continents or massive golem armor
Fortifying grand citadels against catastrophic quakes

name: Time-Phasing Crystal Monolith
description: A towering crystal spire that flickers between eras, revealing glimpses of vanished worlds.
uses: Constructing a time-anchor for temporal research
Navigating time rifts to retrieve lost artifacts

name: God-Forge Anvil
description: A colossal anvil rumored to have been used by divine smiths, its surface etched with cosmos-forging glyphs.
uses: Crafting relics of immense magical potency
Mending fractures in legendary armors (non-weapon armor)

name: Colossus Eye Lens
description: A massive, perfectly convex lens extracted from a fallen colossus, distorting reality as one peers through it.
uses: Amplifying scrying spells for distant realms
Key component in building giant optical arrays

name: Arcane Whale Blubber
description: A vast chunk of oily tissue from a mythical flying whale, shimmering with residual magic.

name: Crystal Spine of the World
description: A monumental crystal spine that once anchored a floating continent, its facets refracting primal energies.
uses: Power source for continent-scale barrier spells
Focus for geo-mantic rituals at grand scale

name: Eternal Glacier Core
description: A massive chunk of ice so cold and ancient it never melts, even in volcanic heat.
uses: Cooling megastructures or forging frost-latticed cities
Forming the nexus of ice-based spell networks

name: Living City Seed
description: A seed large as a cottage, rumored to sprout into a sentient city that rearranges its own streets.
uses: Growing a mobile metropolis in barren lands
Housing a civilization that can traverse continents

name: Orb of Infinite Reflections
description: A grand sphere that reflects a million realities, each glimpse revealing alternate histories.
uses: Gaining strategic insight from parallel worlds
Key to understanding cosmic narrative threads

uses: Supplying potent medicinal extracts at large scale

name: Starbeast Carapace
description: A fragment of a titanic space-dwelling creature’s shell, studded with cosmic barnacles.

name: Aeonwyrm Egg
description: An enormous egg rumored to hatch a creature that drifts through galaxies, warping reality as it matures.

name: Living Gear Colossus Frame
description: A metal frame the size of a fortress, designed to house a mechanical colossus with a soul.

name: Sun-Devouring Blossom
description: A bloom larger than a barn, said to absorb sunlight and store it as tangible energy nectar.

description: A massive skeleton of a dragon that existed before recorded time, bones humming with primordial power.
uses: Harvesting endless streams of raw magical essence

name: Abyssal Mirror Portal
description: A colossal mirror that when activated, reveals the depths of infinite voids between stars.
uses: Studying the invisible fabric of spacetime

name: Giant’s Seed Vault
description: An immense chamber grown from living wood, storing seeds of extinct, legendary flora.

name: Chronoforge Bellows
description: Enormous bellows that inflate with time itself, able to temper materials with temporal flux.
uses: Repairing breaks in the chronological continuum

name: Eternal Gravity Anchor
description: A monumental anchor forged of unknown metal that can moor even floating continents in place.

name: Bio-Lattice Heartwood
description: A trunk-sized lattice grown from gene-spliced trees, resonating with lifeforce.
uses: Forming the living core of bio-architectural megastructures

Integrating nature and city into one organism

name: Phoenix Ash Crucible
description: A towering crucible formed from immortal phoenix ashes, eternally hot and pure.

uses: Collecting airborne mana to irrigate floating fields

name: Forgotten Titan’s Gauntlet
description: A colossal gauntlet, empty and still, rumored to once shape continents by hand.
uses: Holding entire fortresses steady during reconstruction
Inspiring legendary sculptors of stone and land

name: Aether-Wyrd Conductor
description: A large, coiling apparatus that channels ethereal currents, shimmering in shifting spectrums.

description: A gargantuan forge shaped like a skull, designed to temper and infuse intelligence into constructs.
uses: Enabling empathetic constructs for peaceful societies

description: A sprawling altar carved from unknown minerals, said to let mortals speak words that reshape reality.

description: A coral formation as large as a castle, said to telepathically connect minds across oceans.

description: A heart larger than a building, from a leviathan of the deepest trenches, pulsating with bioluminescence.
